Title: The 100 Year-Old Man Who Climbed Out the Window and Disappeared
Writer: Felix Herngren (screenplay), Hans Ingemansson (screenplay), Jonas Jonasson (novel)
Actors: Robert Gustafsson, Mia Skäringer, Iwar Wiklander, David Wiberg
Plot: After living a long and colorful life, Allan Karlsson finds himself stuck in a nursing home. On his 100th birthday, he leaps out a window and begins an unexpected journey.
Language: Swedish, German, English, Spanish, French, Russian
Country: Sweden, Russia, UK, France, Spain, Germany
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.
